name: FightThis.io
description:
FightThis.io:

Fight, Upgrade, Kill -Repeat!
Fight your way up in the Scoreboard. Kill other Players to get more Points! Upgrade your items and fight with bigger and stronger Guns and Weapons! Buy Skins and Upgrades in the Shop. You can also buy funny things to kill enemies, like a loaf, a Hammer and more!

Good Luck!
